title: Rads Error still an issue
body:
So the pinned thread about this is 9months old, i dont know if this means that thought fixed or are still in process of being fixed.

Has been happening for a while, download link is also not working.

Have tried many fixes and each time one has worked it was only for a day or so then back to rads error, anything i have used in the past doesnt fix it a second time so am now out of fixes for it. 

I bring this to the boards as i love playing LoL, but as of the last 4 weeks it has become more trouble then it is worth. If someone has a fix for this i havent tried i would love to hear it. Or riot if your working on the issue still please let us know cause if it is considered fixed and no more progress is being done about the issue then pls let me know so i can give up now instead of wasting my time

replies.body: so got it working again, but logged out and now im getting it again. someone please help. this is getting to the point of fucking ridiculousness, im over it. riot you need to get your shit together.
